import React from 'react' const Cart = ({cartItems, handleAddProduct, handleRemoveProduct}) => { const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce return (
Cart Items
{cartItems.length === 0 && (
No Items added
)}
{cartItems.map((item) =>(
{item.name}
{item.quantity} * Ksh{item.price}
))}
Total Price
) } export default Cart
